summary: The future of digital identity is here - The Fable of the Dragon Tyrant Project, inspired by Vitalik Buterin, is building the first ever DRAGON Token marketplace. Our mission is to bridge humanity into the Web3 world by giving them a place to discover and showcase their most cherished passions. Everything on Dragon is permanent and unique to you.
proposal:
Hello Dragon Tamers! 🐲 

As we all know, every dragon needs a lair, and every lair needs a solid foundation. As a B2B toolbox, we're offering you a set of tools to build your own digital fortress for your DRAGON Tokens. 

1. 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY) - Create a marketplace for your DRAGON Tokens, with customizable colors, logo, and fees. 

2. 🎰 Lottery - Why not add a little fun to your community with a blockchain-based lottery? 

3. 🪙 Wallet - A safe and secure home for your DRAGON Tokens. 

4. 🌾 Farming - Encourage your community to grow their DRAGON Token stash with staking and yield farming. 

5. 🗳 DAO - Let your community have a say in the future of your project with a governance and proposal system. 

6. 🌉 CrossChain - Broaden your horizons with an EVM compatible blockchain bridge. 

7. 🚀 IDOFactory - Launchpad - A launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking. 

Remember, it's not about playing, it's about creating. Interested in building your lair? Check out our demo at https://t.me/onoutdemos. 

And remember, the only thing better than owning a dragon, is owning a dragon with its own marketplace. 🐉🔥

Let's make the Fable of the Dragon Tyrant a reality! 👋
